config.roadweaver.title: RoadWeaver Configuration
config.roadweaver.enable_prediction.tool: Predict structure locations based on world seed, filtered by whitelist/blacklist.
config.roadweaver.radius_chunks.tooltip: Prediction radius centered at spawn, in chunks.
config.roadweaver.biome_prefilter.toolti: Prefilter by allowed biomes of selected structures to reduce false positives and checks.
config.roadweaver.whitelist.tooltip: Allowed structures or tags. Supports direct IDs (minecraft:village_plains), tags (#minecraft:village), and wildcards (mvs:houses/*).
config.roadweaver.blacklist.tooltip: Blocked structures or tags. Supports wildcards like namespace:path/*.
gui.roadweaver.map.title: Road Map
config.roadweaver.initial_plan_radius_ch: At new world start, build network around spawn within this radius (in chunks).
config.roadweaver.dynamic_plan_enabled.t: Periodically plan around players as new structures enter the configured radius.
config.roadweaver.dynamic_plan_radius_ch: Radius around each player (in chunks) to include structures in planning.
config.roadweaver.allow_artificial.toolt: If enabled, the mod will pave road surfaces. Disable to prevent paving (useful for planning or markers only).
config.roadweaver.place_waypoints.toolti: Only place waypoints/markers instead of paving the road surface.
config.roadweaver.averaging_radius.toolt: Smooth the target Y by averaging nearby samples. Larger values reduce bumps but may flatten details.
config.roadweaver.lamp_interval.tooltip: Place a lamp/marker every N segments; larger values place fewer lamps.
config.roadweaver.generation_threads.too: Number of worker threads used for asynchronous road generation.
config.roadweaver.a_star_step.tooltip: Grid step between sampled neighbors for A*. Larger values reduce nodes and improve performance but may reduce path fidelity. Default 16.
config.roadweaver.max_concurrent_generat: Cap the number of roads generating in parallel.
config.roadweaver.dynamic_plan_stride_ch: Step size (in chunks) for triggering dynamic planning as players move; larger stride triggers less frequently.
config.roadweaver.planning_algorithm.too: Choose the primary edge algorithm for road network planning.
config.roadweaver.planning_algorithm_del: When enabled, plan primary edges with Delaunay triangulation; otherwise use K-Nearest Neighbors.
config.roadweaver.planning_algorithm_knn: Plan primary edges with KNN (sparse, local connections).
config.roadweaver.planning_algorithm_rng: Plan primary edges with RNG (sparser than Delaunay and Gabriel).
